feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Routing Form - Crash due to an invalid state of connected field that was deleted in main form by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19421
  • fix: #19296 Success pages shows wrong nr of occurrences (recurring booking) by @PAVANNAIK25 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19304
  • fix: preserve columnVisibility from initialState by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19412
  • feat: v2 routing forms responses endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19319
  • fix: typos in packages/features by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19220
  • fix: Tabs activation issue and refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19399
  • feat: display alert when leaving/reloading booking page by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18932
  • fix: booking fields being overridden whenever saving with atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19339
  • refactor: Enabling typescript 5.3.3 in @calcom/trpc by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19394
  • fix: skip confirm step followup by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19076
  • chore: remove deprecated code, Meta & MetaProvider by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19407
  • docs: add help section for creating phone only event type by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19440
  • chore: More salesforce logs by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19409
  • fix: typos in packages/ui by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19434
  • fix: Issues in custom event name by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19405

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.4...v5.0.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: block POST requests to invalid routes in middleware intentionally by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19446
  • feat: enable_pip_ui in dailyvideo by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19423
  • perf: do not use dynamic imports for settings layouts by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19461
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19462
  • fix: FAB size by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19466
  • fix: Revert "fix: FAB size" by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19467
  • Upgrade dub version by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19472
  • fix: FAB size by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19469
  • perf: move all booking pages into (booking-page-wrapper) route group by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19321
  • fix: Username input field not in line by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19480
  • chore: new license purchase link by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19363
  • fix: Misaligned Select with input box by @harshit078 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19400
  • fix: Wrong avatars shown in webhooks page by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19386
  • feat(lexicalEditor): custom enter-key plugin by @SySagar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15952
  • fix: display error msg when end date not selected by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19485
  • fix: typos in packages/app-store by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19470
  • feat: extract bottom navigation logic into a custom hook by @ddoemonn in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19468
  • revert: default people filter at bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19486
  • chore: cleanup - Remove WithLayout HoC itself by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19490
  • fix: Some errors breaking storybook build by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18767
  • chore: bump alby packages by @rolznz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18406
  • fix: typos in several package/ directories by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19495
  • chore: replace toaster with sonner by @nayan-bagale in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19342
  • chore: .env.example by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19364
  • chore: removed experimental calcom license api call by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19366
  • fix: /bookings get handler by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19369
  • fix: replace filter implementations on bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19445
  • fix: Fix for 'Scheduling by cal.com' is still showing in workflow emails even when branding is disabled by @sn10-debug in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18862
  • perf: improve matching paths in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19491
  • revert: "fix: replace filter implementations on bookings (#19445)" by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19506
  • fix: consider sendToAll settings in routingForms response by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18226

New Contributors

  • @sn10-debug made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18862

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.5...v5.0.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: cache app store imports by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19519
  • perf: run ssrInit() at root layout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19460
  • chore: migrate /api/avatar/[uuid] to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19514
  • fix: Encode usernames in booking url to UTF-8 to prevent 500 throws by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19475
  • chore: pr-template updates to include demonstrations by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19533
  • fix: No option to install/disconnect app from app detail page by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17997
  • fix: Attempted to call ZFormsInputSchema() from the server by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19540
  • feat: v2 managed organizations by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19341
  • fix: disable skip confirm for booker_layout=WEEK_VIEW by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19524
  • fix: refactor filter UIs on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19532
  • chore: remove not used code related to filters on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19450
  • fix: some ui fixes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19558
  • chore: migrate /user embed pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19149
  • feat: Manage Team ooo or crud by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16456
  • fix: old v2 booking cancel endpoint issue by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19564
  • fix: apply routing form filter by default on /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19535
  • chore: small ooo translation fixes by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19569
  • feat: Introduce a 'slot no longer available' message by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18935
  • refactor: platform default event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19225
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19576
  • fix: time slot doesn't get selected in email embed by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19523
  • test: Salesforce CRM - Add user facing tests and more logs by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19531
  • feat: booker atom prevent event type success redirect by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19573
  • fix: phone input and week view missing styles atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19581
  • feat: support attendee name and email filter on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19565

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.6...v5.0.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: ics compat with older ical specced calendars by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19582
  • perf: do not import from @calcom/lib/server barrel file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19579
  • feat: eleven labs app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19585
  • fix: add flex-wrap to fix overflow by @scarlachs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584
  • fix: two items in one row in profile by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19602
  • perf: Do not import Stripe lib in getServerErrorFromUnknown by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19578
  • fix: updating attributes doesn't happen in real-time by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19604
  • fix: remove wrong conditions to fetch users on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19580
  • perf: Remove PlainChat from pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19588
  • fix: Valid timeslot marked 'slot no longer available' by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19590
  • perf: dynamically import sentry lib in error catch clause by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19607

New Contributors

  • @scarlachs made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.7...v5.0.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: v2 managed user attendee bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19612
  • fix: added zoom, msTeams as valid locations in event-type, booker atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19599
  • revert: country code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19618
  • chore: migrate OG image generation API to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19568
  • fix: hubSpot doesn't work for paid team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19609
  • chore: migrate /org and /team embed pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19148
  • fix: remove onboarding check for platform account creation by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19449
  • fix: Change the origin to WEBAPP_URL for routing from event redirect URL by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19593
  • chore: moved /help to github.com/calcom/help by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19554
  • chore: update platform docs for teams setup by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19619
  • feat: Task createCRMEvent can retry at cutomizable fixed interval by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19571
  • fix: update profile instead of username. Display p.username by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19621
  • fix: few ui issues by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19625
  • feat: plain-thread-tier by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19463

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.8...v5.0.9
